question: The Asian Development Bank (ADB) is to provide USD 346 million loan for power supply to rural agriculture in which state?
explanation:
The Asian Development Bank (ADB) and the Government of India has recently signed a USD 346 million loan pact for providing power supply to rural agriculturists in Maharashtra.
The project aims to provide efficient and reliable power to agricultural customers in rural areas of the state under Maharashtra Rural High Voltage Distribution System (HVDS) Expansion Program.
